high_descs: Turn left and walk to the desk.
Pick up the clock on the right.
Turn around, walk to the wall, turn left, and walk to the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine a clock under the lamp.

high_descs: Turn left and go to the desk to the right of the bed.
Pick up the clock to the right of the other clock.
Turn right and head to the nightstand underneath the window.
Turn on the lamp on the nightstand.
anns.task_desc: Turn on the lamp on the nightstand while holding a clock.

high_descs: Move to the left so that you are in the center of the desk.
Pick up the clock from the top shelf of the desk on the right hand side.
Turn around to the right and walk to the bedside table.
Turn on the lamp that is on the bedside table.
anns.task_desc: Turn on a lamp while holding a clock.
